issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
I can't see the local filesystem node in Project Explorer.
I searched and searched for 2 days but couldnt find the answers.
The reason I want to do this is I migrated from anotehr machine and want to promote my folder to a project.

I am using Titanium Studio on OSX 10.10

h3. Actual Result
I can't see the local filesystem node in Project Explorer.

h3. Expected Result
I should see the local filesystem node in Project Explorer.

comments.body:
The project Explorer will only display the file system in Titanium workspace which you can set it when you open the app.
You may need switch your workspace to destination folder, or import your old projects into studio of this new machine.
